advancements.cwsr.really_rad.desc: Equip two Cyan Swords at the same time

advancements.cwsr.a_blast.desc: Equip a Wind Boom and a Wind Blast at the same time
advancements.cwsr.unexpected_farewell.de: Destroy a mod's sword mod for the first time
advancements.cwsr.dual_wield.title: Dual Wield!
advancements.cwsr.left_edge.title: Where have I left the edge?
advancements.cwsr.left_edge.desc: Have a Sword Handle in your inventory
advancements.cwsr.something_else.title: This is something else
advancements.cwsr.something_else.desc: Craft a sword from Cyan Warrior Swords
advancements.cwsr.removing_dents.title: Removing the dents
advancements.cwsr.the_more.title: The more the better
advancements.cwsr.best_both.title: The best of both worlds!
advancements.cwsr.mix_enough.title: You can never mix enough
advancements.cwsr.not_diamonds.title: It is not made only of diamond
advancements.cwsr.i_hope.title: Safe in my wood house
tooltip.cwsr.ability_totem: Totem: Disable Active Abilities on right click.
tooltip.cwsr.synergy: Totem: Grants you Dual Wield Abilities for your swords.
tooltip.cwsr.fire_sword: Sword: Fiery touch, summon fire at ground while being immune to it.
tooltip.cwsr.water_sword: Sword: Summon water at ground, breath in it.
tooltip.cwsr.earth_sword: Sword: Summon dirt blocks at ground, light resistance to damage.
tooltip.cwsr.wind_sword: Sword: Light as a feather while blowing away your enemies.
tooltip.cwsr.thunder_sword: Sword: Fast as a lightning, summon them around you.
tooltip.cwsr.dark_sword: Sword: Become a shadow, immmerse in darkness your enemies... even yourself sometimes.
tooltip.cwsr.light_sword: Sword: Light becomes your ally. See everyone, take its light out of their eyes.
tooltip.cwsr.ender_sword: Sword: Summon ender pearls from fallen End inhabitants.
tooltip.cwsr.beast_sword: Sword: Seal an eternal alliance with wolves.
tooltip.cwsr.combustion_sword: Sword: Fire will summon on your enemies, even out of your sight.
tooltip.cwsr.ice_sword: Sword: Temperatures lowers on your sword, and so it does around you.
tooltip.cwsr.wild_nature: Sword: Summon cactus blocks at ground, have its toxic blood on your blade.
tooltip.cwsr.wind_impulse: Sword: Knockback your enemies and jump at will, even when you're falling.
tooltip.cwsr.thunder_shock: Sword: Cast lightnings so strong your enemies won't avoid them
tooltip.cwsr.dark_nether: Sword: Wither head's come out at will. Will you fall at darkness?
tooltip.cwsr.light_nether: Sword: Light saves you from all evil in the world, and grants you the power to erradicate it.
tooltip.cwsr.ender_portal: Sword: You are near to the power of End dimension. Your enemies also feel it.
tooltip.cwsr.golem_sword: Sword: Golems may be an artificial creature, but not always your friend.
tooltip.cwsr.ender_fire: Sword: Fire teleporting, but not immune to nausea.
tooltip.cwsr.ender_wind: Sword: Knockback your enemies while teleporting.
tooltip.cwsr.ender_thunder: Sword: Shock your enemies and teleport at the speed of lightning.
tooltip.cwsr.peaceful_nature: Sword: Nature helps you to trap, but not to harm.
tooltip.cwsr.time_sword: Sword: Light and dark at the tip of your fingers.
tooltip.cwsr.steam_sword: Sword: Awaken the heated water under the surface.
tooltip.cwsr.meteor_sword: Sword: Fiery projectiles at your disposal.
tooltip.cwsr.wind_blast: Sword: Collide wind-compressed earth at your enemies.
tooltip.cwsr.wind_boom: Sword: Wind and Earth collide below your feet.
tooltip.cwsr.thunderstorm_sword: Sword: Faster than thunder, lighter than wind.
tooltip.cwsr.meteoric_thunderstorm: Sword: Faster, lighter... and also hit harder.
tooltip.cwsr.tri_ender: Sword: Ender teleporting three times deadlier.
tooltip.cwsr.atlantis_sword: Sword: Swim in the oceans as if you were walking on land.
tooltip.cwsr.nether_portal: Sword: Not being born where others, can be somehow handy.
tooltip.cwsr.cyan_sword: Sword: Noble and strong spirit. King of all swords.
tooltip.cwsr.transmutation_furnace: Workstation: Melt your swords to obtain its purest form.
tooltip.cwsr.sword_handle: Item: A basic item to craft swords.
tooltip.cwsr.earth_essence: Essence: Purest form of earth energy.
tooltip.cwsr.beast_essence: Essence: Purest form of beast energy.
tooltip.cwsr.dark_essence: Essence: Purest form of dark energy.
tooltip.cwsr.ender_essence: Essence: Purest form of ender energy.
tooltip.cwsr.fire_essence: Essence: Purest form of fire energy.
tooltip.cwsr.thunder_essence: Essence: Purest form of thunder energy.
tooltip.cwsr.water_essence: Essence: Purest form of water energy.
tooltip.cwsr.wind_essence: Essence: Purest form of wind energy.
tooltip.cwsr.light_essence: Essence: Purest form of light energy.
tooltip.cwsr.mixed_essence: Essence: Purest form of energy from all 9 life elements.
tooltip.cwsr.corrupt_essence: Essence: Empty and broken essence, produced by mistake in the Transmutation Furnace.
